page.title: 04FARMING GREENOCK
page.content: {Glenbrae Road Farm} is over 100 years old. It is owned by Mr and Mrs Bowes. It is a {poultry} farm with 3000 hens and 3 cockerels. Mr Bowes also has 5 pet ponies and 3 dogs. The {animals} are fed twice a day. Cow byres have been made into boarding kennels for dogs. No {crops} are grown, except for their own use, because there is a shortage of land. It hasn't always been a small farm. 65 years ago land was sold for housing and later to house the waterworks. Mr Bowes enjoys farming. He always wanted to be a farmer. Although the farm is so close to the houses, he says he doesn't have any trouble. He thinks that it is very pleasant working with animals.
